sentences.en: At the same time, the anti-colonial movements for independence in Asia, Africa and the Caribbean appropriated Lincoln as an exemplar of freedom and national unity.
sentences.cn: 同时，追求独立的反殖民运动在亚洲、非洲和加勒比地区展开，这些运动都将林肯作为自由和国家统一的榜样。

sentences.en: Britain was the largest colonial power .
sentences.cn: 英国曾是最大的殖民强国。

sentences.en: Dutch colonial authorities imprisoned him for his part in the independence movement.
sentences.cn: 荷兰殖民当局因他参加独立运动而把他关押了起来。

sentences.en: He claims that imperialists are trying to re-establish colonial rule in the country.
sentences.cn: 他宣称帝国主义者企图重新在该国建立殖民统治。

sentences.en: Her eventful life included holding senior positions in the Colonial Service.
sentences.cn: 她一生经历丰富，曾在殖民服务局担任高级职位。

sentences.en: His sentiments were a throwback to the old colonial days.
sentences.cn: 他的观点还是从前殖民时代的那种观点.

sentences.en: Historically speaking, colonial writing is of absorbing value.
sentences.cn: 从历史观点来看, 殖民时代的写作,是有其引人入胜之处的.

sentences.en: I never acquired that admirable colonial quality - good humour.
sentences.cn: 我从不具有令人羡慕的殖民地特性 - 诙谐的幽默.

sentences.en: I sat on the Colonial bench that was just to the left of the office doorway.
sentences.cn: 我坐在带有殖民地时期风格的长凳上，就在办公室出门靠左的地方。

sentences.en: In our freedom, we reject the colonial apartheid system that has caused genocide to our people, and to all Indigenous peoples.
sentences.cn: 以我们自由的名义, 我们拒绝这对我们人民, 和所有原住民造成种族灭绝的殖民隔离体系.

sentences.en: Iron manufacturing also gradually began to develop in the colonial era.
sentences.cn: 在殖民地时代,炼铁业也开始逐步发展.

sentences.en: Kenya was under ( British ) colonial rule for many years.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚曾多年受 ( 英国 ) 殖民统治.

sentences.en: President Mitterrand arrived in Hanoi yesterday to bury old colonial and cold war enmities.
sentences.cn: 密特朗总统昨天到达河内，以期结束长久以来殖民战争和冷战造成的敌意。

sentences.en: The Colonial Office was absorbed into the Foreign Office.
sentences.cn: 殖民部被并入了外交部。

sentences.en: The mind reverts to the earliest days of colonial history.
sentences.cn: 我们回想到早期的殖民地历史.

sentences.en: The natives were unwilling to be bent by colonial power.
sentences.cn: 土著居民不愿受殖民势力的摆布.

sentences.en: The place of Admiralty Courts is supplied by Colonial Courts of Admiralty.
sentences.cn: 海军法院已被殖民地海事法院取代.

sentences.en: When Dutch colonial rule ended in the 19th century the civil service was anglicised.
sentences.cn: 荷兰殖民统治在19世纪结束时，文职部门已被英国化了。

words.tran_cn: 殖民主义者的；奉行殖民主义的
殖民者；殖民地居民；移民
殖民者；殖民地开拓者；移入选民；移民
开拓殖民地；移居于殖民地
将…开拓为殖民地；移于殖民地；从他地非法把选民移入
殖民地时代的,美初期的,旧时的

trans.tran_cn: 殖民的，美洲殖民地时期的
trans.tran_en: relating to a country that controls and rules other countries, usually ones that are far away

trans.tran_cn: 生活在殖民地的宗主国居民
trans.tran_en: someone who lives in a  colony  but who is a citizen of the country that rules the colony
